[detail level 123]
 ▼ApplicationsAll the applications that this repository contains
 Hello World BlinkyA simple application that blinks a LED
 Hello World RTT printfA simple application that blinks a LED and outputs a printf statement over SEGGER's Real Time Transfer (RTT) channel through the JLink debugger
 SAADC LoggerLogging data from the SAADC peripheral
 ▼CodebaseThe various code-base developed for the applications to use
 ▼Assertions and Error HandlingHandlers for runtime assertions as well as Nordic Semi's SoftDevice and SDK error handling
 Application error handlerHandler which prints application error info over Segger RTT channel in DEBUG modes
 Static and runtime assertionHandler which prints runtime assertion info over Segger RTT channel and includes assert.h for static assertion wrapper
 ▼Hardware Abstraction LayerHardware abstraction layer for the peripherals to be used with the hal defines in the SDK
 Clocks HALHardware abstraction layer of the high frequency and low frequency clock
 SAADC HALHardware abstraction layer of the Successive Approximation Analog to Digital Converter (SAADC) peripheral
 ▼Peripheral ModulesModules that are strongly tied to peripheral(s) directly for their operation
 ms timer moduleDriver to use milli-second timers using the RTC peripheral
 ▼Generic utility codeCode as helpers for common tasks
 Common utilitiesCommon helpers used in C programs
 nRF specific utilitiesHelpers specific to the nRF SoCs
 ▼PlatformsAll the hardware platforms that the applications can run on
